p: Gadolinium(III) nitrate hexahydrate [Gd(NO 3) 3·6H 2O, Aldrich, 99.9%], lanthanum(III) nitrate hydrate [La(NO 3) 3· xH 2O, Aldrich, 99.9%], europium(III) nitrate pentahydrate [Eu(NO 3) 3·5H 2O, Aldrich, 99%], dysprosium(III) nitrate hydrate [Dy(NO 3) 3· xH 2O, Aldrich, 99.9%], sodium orthovanadate (Na 3VO 4, Aldrich, 99.9%), sodium tungstate dihydrate (Na 2WO 4·2H 2O, Aldrich, ≥99%), sodium molybdate (Na 2MoO 4, Aldrich, ≥98%), sodium citrate (Na 3Cit, Na 3C 6O 7H 5·2H 2O, Aldrich, 99.5%), PAA (average M w ≈ 1800, Aldrich), ethylene glycol, zirconium(IV) n-propoxide 70% in 1-propanol (Aldrich), triblock copolymers Pluronic F127 ( M w ≈ 12 600), 2,4-pentanedione (acetylacetonate, Alfa Aesar), absolute ethanol, methanol, HCl (3.571 mol·L –1, Panreac), and Milli-Q water.
